channel.title: David Allen Coe
channel.description: Who else likes his music? *Raises hand* Besides me of course. Let the spam, flaming, and general racism begin.

item.title: David Allen Coe
item.dc:creator: @Doodie Doodie
item.description:
@Doodie wrote:

[quote=“one uglybird, post:11, topic:46439”]THREE MONTHS!?

Well fck me -.- Here I was getting all ‘omg!’-y about this and now I’m gonna have to wait as long as he’s been banned, for him to be un-banned! F*cking great.[/quote] Hopefully I wont have to wait any longer… =P I’m gonna go check up on him…

Read full topic

item.title: David Allen Coe
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

At a time when the touring industry is anemic, he continues to play some 200 dates a year. David is packing 'em in on college campuses, biker bars (Iron Horse Saloon), honky tonks, state fairs, blues bars and music halls. If there's a stage and people looking to let off some steam and have their feelings re-calibrated, David will be there. It's a covenant that keeps the "Long Haired Redneck" on the road.

Read full topic

@davidude36 wrote:

one uglybird:

It’s been over an hour and it’s still pending… I think they’re asleep lol =P Anyways I’m gonna go now, have a good one, especially you blood ^^

be prepared to wait 2 months ++
i have been waiting that long and still no reply on my old main.
and by the way if that was an account that was banned for autoing then there is a 0% chance it will be unbanned, they only really unban things like swearing or drop trading.

item.title: David Allen Coe
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

Silly BloodRayne. Typos are for noobs ^^[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 09:49:41 PM[/size][hr]HOLY SHI- (Dubbed voice that sounds nothing like mine:) Airplane!

Out of boredom, I just checked out my ‘appeal an offense/ban’ thing on the main page on my most recent permanently banned main evil oni11, when I decided to check out one uglybird, my first real main, who has been permanently banned for over a year. At some point over the past year, they decided to give me one FINAL chance. And they mean it this time! Here’s what I said to try and get my oldest runescape account (almost 4 years old!!) un-banned. Wish me luck, because I already sent the following in, right at 400 characters:

If I could just go back in time and stop myself from being banned… I was foolish; far too arrogant for my own good. I don’t know what to say to try and convince you that I’m a changed man. I just wish that maybe, you could find it in your hearts to un-ban me. I’ll do my very best to be respectful to my fellow man once more, and help those in need. So what do you say; one final chance? Please?..

Is that convincing or what?

Read full topic
